generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@500&family=Poppins:wght@600&display=swap");.section{padding:6.5rem 0 2rem}.section__title{text-align:center;font-size:2.25rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.section__title:before{content:attr(data-heading);display:block;font-size:1rem;font-weight:500;color:#a600ff}.container{max-width:98%;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}.grid{display:grid}*{margin:0;scroll-behavior:smooth}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}body,html{position:relative;font-family:Poppins,sans-serif;line-height:1.5;background-color:#00002a;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;z-index:0;height:100vh}button,input,select,textarea{font:inherit}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p{overflow-wrap:break-word}a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit}ul{list-style:none}canvas,img,svg,video{max-width:100%}.section{padding-left:1rem;padding-right:1rem;overflow:hidden;min-height:100vh;padding-top:1rem}@media (min-width:650px){.section{padding-left:5rem;padding-right:5rem}}.section__header-title{font-weight:400;font-size:17px;color:#500182}.section__header-subtitle{font-size:27px;font-weight:700}.section__header-subtitle,.section__title{color:#fff}.coolLink{position:relative;display:grid;place-items:center;overflow:hidden}.coolLink:before{content:"";position:relative;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:3px;background:currentColor;transform:scaleX(0);transform-origin:right;transition:transform .5s cubic-bezier(.5,.5,.3,1)}.coolLink:after{content:attr(data-text);position:absolute;top:10%;height:100%;transform:translate3d(150%,0,0)}.coolLink:hover:before{transform:scaleX(1);transform-origin:left}.coolLink:hover:after{transform:translateZ(0)}.coolLink span{transition:transform .5s cubic-bezier(.5,.5,.3,1)}.coolLink:hover cubic-bezier(.585,2.5,.645,.55)}.coolButton:hover:before{clip-path:path("M143,77 C117,96 74,100.5 45.5,91.5 C17,82.5 -10.5,57 5.5,31.5 C21.5,6 79,-5.5 130.5,4 C182,13.5 169,58 143,77 Z")}.coolButton span{mix-blend-mode:difference;font-weight:500}.coolButton:after{content:"";height:85%;width:95%;top:6px;border:1px solid #fff;border-radius:58% 42% 55% 45%/56% 45% 55% 44%;transform:rotate(-20deg);transition:transform .5s cubic-bezier(.585,2.5,.645,.58)}.coolButton:hover:after{transform:translate3d(0,-5px,0)}@media (max-width:800px){.coolButton{transform:scale3d(.7,.7,.7);font-size:23px}}.coloredIcon{color:#fff;font-size:35px}.coloredIcon:hover{animation:coloredIconAnimation .2s infinite}@keyframes coloredIconAnimation{0%{text-shadow:5px 4px #a600ff,-5px -6px #2196f3}25%{text-shadow:-5px -6px #a600ff,5px 4px #2196f3}50%{text-shadow:5px -4px #a600ff,-8px 4px #2196f3}75%{text-shadow:-8px -4px #a600ff,-5px -4px #2196f3}to{text-shadow:-5px 0 #a600ff,5px -4px #2196f3}}.coolCircleEyeButton{position:relative;display:inline-block}.coolCircleEyeButton .textcircle{display:block;width:250px;animation:rotate 7s linear infinite}.coolCircleEyeButton .textcircle text{font-size:32px;fill:#ffa600;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:2px}@keyframes rotate{to{transform:rotate(-1turn)}}.coolCircleEyeButton:hover text{font-weight:500}.coolCircleEyeButton .eye__inner,.coolCircleEyeButton .eye__iris,.coolCircleEyeButton .eye__lashes-up{animation:hide show{0%{opacity:1}10%{opacity:0}}.eye{position:absolute;width:60px;height:60px;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.eye__inner,.eye__lashes-down,.eye__lashes-up,.eye__outer{stroke:#ffa600;fill:none;stroke-width:1.5px}.eye__lashes-down{opacity:0}.project__tags{position:absolute;bottom:1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:1rem}.coolFunnyLink{position:relative;font-family:sans-serif}.coolFunnyLink
